message.raw: Update foot contact with more realistic contact parameters approximating rubber shoes.  stiffness kp: 160,200 N/m, damping kd: 100.0 Ns/m, friction coefficients mu1 = mu2 = 1.0, allowalble interpenetration depth minDepth = 0.0m.  This change will also reduce noise (spikes) in velocity solution and reduce feet drift when compared against original stiffness of 6e6 N/m and damping of 1.0 Ns/m.
